DOC.brief_summary: rFSH HMG use control ovarian stimulation patient submit IVF . However , debate literature one good induce ovulation patient receive GnRH antagonist block premature Luteinizing Hormone ( LH ) secretion . The investigator propose Randomized Clinical Trial ( RCT ) investigate difference among recombinant FSH HMG patient submit IVF use GnRH antagonist .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Comparing Embryonic Quality rFSH Versus hMG IVF Protocol With GnRH Antagonist
DOC.detailed_description: To compare embryonic quality clinical outcome use human menopause gonadotropin ( hMG ) recombinant follicle stimulate hormone ( rFSH ) ovarian stimulation IVF cycle GnRH antagonist protocol . Design : open randomize single center study infertile patient submit IVF compare IVF outcome hMG rFSH control GnRH antagonist . Setting : A single private center reproductive medicine association Universidade Federal Rio Grande Sul . Patients : Infertile woman normal ovarian reserve IVF indication . Intervention : The patient randomize two group , 85 receive rFSH 83 receive hMG ovulation induction , group use GnRH antagonist prevent ovulation . Main Outcome Measure : Total embryonic score best embryonic score . Secondary outcome : Total dose gonadotropin , number size follicle end stimulation , number mature oocytes , number embryo , pregnancy rate .
DOC.criteria: 25 40 infertile submit IVF hormonal disease normal FSH ( < 10 ) antimullerian hormone ( AMH ) > 1 ng < 10 ng ovary first second IVF thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) , prolactin ( PRL ) alter endometrioma ovarian tumor cyst previous Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome ( OHSS ) severe male factor
